ISSUE.TITLE: REST API thirparties setlevelprice fix
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Bug problem : the API thirparties setlevelprice does not work solution : in file api_thirdparties.class.php correct L562 from ` * @url PUT {id}/setpricelevel` to ` * @url PUT {id}/setpricelevel/{priceLevel}` to fix the API ### Environment Version 18.0.3 ### Environment OS _No response_ ### Environment Web server _No response_ ### Environment PHP _No response_ ### Environment Database _No response_ ### Environment URL(s) _No response_ ### Expected and actual behavior _No response_ ### Steps to reproduce the behavior _No response_ ### Attached files _No response_
